name: nodejs-ts-starter
description: Starter project for developing with NodeJs (Typescript) as backend server

scripts.revert: npm run compile && sequelize --config sequelizecli.js db:migrate:undo
scripts.revert-all: npm run compile && sequelize --config sequelizecli.js db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.migrate: npm run compile && sequelize --config sequelizecli.js db:migrate
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run init
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.start: npm run compile && node --inspect=0.0.0.0:56745 -r dotenv/config src/index.js
